name: ldap.server.url
description: URL for the LDAP server (e.g. ldaps://ldap.domain.org:636/)
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.context.root
description: Distinguished Name of the directory node under which users are searched for
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.bind.dn
description: Distinguished Name of the LDAP user account used to query the directory
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.bind.password
description: Password of the LDAP user account used to query the directory
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.query.filter
description: LDAP query used to retrieve the distinguished name of a user, given the USM user name
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.label.telephoneNumber
description: The user attribute mapping to the telephoneNumber label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.label.mobileNumber
description: The user attribute mapping to the mobileNumber label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.label.faxNumber
description: The user attribute mapping to the faxNumber label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.label.mail
description: The user attribute mapping to the mail label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.server.url
description: URL for the LDAP server for user administration (e.g. ldaps://ldap.domain.org:636/)
subject: Administration

name: ldap.context.root
description: Distinguished Name of the directory node under which users are searched for when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.bind.dn
description: Distinguished Name of the LDAP user account used to query the directory when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.bind.password
description: Password of the LDAP user account used to query the directory
subject: Administration

name: ldap.query.filter
description: LDAP query used to retrieve the distinguished name of a user, given the USM user name when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.query.attributes
description: Comma separated list of LDAP attributes to be retrieved from a user account. The attributed should be listed in the order of first name, last name, phone, mobile, fax and email. If you want to omit some of them then leave the corresponding position empty by ,,.
subject: Authentication

name: update.contact.details.enabled
description: Enable (true) or disable (false) the <<Update Contact Details>> feature
subject: Feature

name: review.contact.details.enabled
description: Enable (true) or disable (false) the <<Review Contact Details Updates before they become effective>> feature
subject: Feature

name: account.maxSessionOneSite
description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions with the same user from a single site
subject: Account

name: account.maxSessionAnySite
description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions with the same user from any site
subject: Account

name: account.maxSessionDuration
description: Maximum duration of a user session in number of seconds
subject: Account

name: ldap.enabled
description: Flag that controls whether LDAP based authentication is enabled (value "true") or disabled (value "false")
subject: Authentication

name: ldap.enabled
description: Flag that controls whether LDAP based authentication is enabled for user administration (value "true") or disabled (value "false")
subject: Administration

name: ldap.label.firstName
description: The user attribute mapping to the firstName label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: ldap.label.lastName
description: The user attribute mapping to the lastName label on the UI when using LDAP in user administration
subject: Administration

name: password.numberOfChallenges
description: Number of challenges used to amend user information
subject: Password

name: account.lockoutFreshold
description: Number of consecutive failed logins that trigger an account lockout. A value of 0 (zero) disables account lockout for consecutive failed logins
subject: Authentication

name: account.lockoutDuration
description: Account lockout duration in minutes. A value of 0 (zero) disables account lockout for consecutive failed logins
subject: Authentication

name: password.renewalReminder
description: Password renewal reminder at user login in number of days before expiration. A value of 0 (zero) disables reminder at login
subject: Authentication

name: password.renewalReminder
description: Password renewal reminder via e-mail in number of days before expiration. A value of 0 (zero) disables reminder via e-mail
subject: Password

name: option.valueSize
description: The size of maximum allowed data for value of an option
subject: Information

name: password.minLength
description: Password minimum length
subject: Password

name: password.minSpecial
description: Password minimum number of special characters
subject: Password

name: password.minDigits
description: Password minimum number of digits
subject: Password

name: password.minHistory
description: Minimum number of different passwords before reusing a (previous) password
subject: Password

name: password.maxValidity
description: Password validity in days of a freshly changed password. A value of 0 (zero) disables password expiration
subject: Password

name: password.mixUpperLowerCase
description: Force mixing upper and lower case characters
subject: Password
